paymentResults.container.alertMessage.bo:
Your booking has been cancelled due to overdue payment. We are sorry for your inconvenience.
Don’t worry, no money has been charged. Book new ticket for your journey!
paymentResults.container.alertMessage.pa:
Oops, seems your card or payment provider is having a bad day.
Don’t worry, no money has been charged. Try making payment again or book new ticket!

Your payment is being processed by payment provider.
After successful payment, you will receive your E-ticket used for boarding via SMS and Email.
paymentResults.successContent.thankMessa:
Thank you for booking your bus tickets via VeXeRe.com.
We would like to skip the confirmation call in order to process your booking as quickly as possible. Instead, we have sent your E-ticket via number {customerPhone} and email address {customerEmail}.
paymentResults.successContent.reservedCo: Please make payment before {expiredTime}. Otherwise, unpaid booking will be automatically cancelled.
After successful payment, you will receive your E-ticket used for boarding via SMS and Email.

After your payment is successfully confirmed, passenger will receive an email with successful payment confirmation. Information about Surcharge will be sent to you when the official fares are announced.
, inform the staff that you want to make payment for VeXeRe ticket, with booking code {bookingCode}.
At {convenienceStoreAddress}, inform the staff that you want to make payment for VeXeRe ticket, with booking code {bookingCode}.

Note:

  • Provide exact transaction information, and transfer due amount within the same bank as ours so that VeXeRe can receive money and send you the confirmation immediately.

  • In case of making payment via ATM, or your E-bank not allowing to write transfer content, contact our Hotline after your successful payment.
Please make payment for your ticket at Bus operator's office.
Please make payment for your ticket at Bus operator's office before {receiveTime}.
Otherwise, unpaid booking will be automatically cancelled at {expiredTime}.
Check Bus Operator's office address now!
At VeXeRe Office, inform the staff that you want to make payment for bus ticket, with booking code {bookingCode}.
paymentResults.container.note.title: Note
paymentResults.container.note.content.ti: In order to manage your Booking, please check at
paymentResults.container.note.content:
Pickup time and pickup point could be changed under the circumstances. You will be informed by VeXeRe or Bus Operator as soon as possible if such changes occur.
In case of Limousine Bus, please bring only 1 carry-on baggage and 1 checked baggage weighing up to 10kg.
paymentResults.container.note.isDepositC: Upon receiving the official price from VeXeRe or Bus Operator, please make payment on time. After the expired time, unpaid tickets will be cancelled and be not refunded.
paymentResults.successContent.paymentCom: Please show up at boarding point at least 30 min (Weekdays) or 60 min (Holidays) before boarding time to change paper ticket (if any) and check-in.

Kindly provide us with your Vietnam’s phone number when you arrive in Vietnam. This phone number is for the bus operator to contact you if there are any changes in your trip. In case you cannot obtain one, your Line/Whatsapp/Viber number can be used since we can make update with the bus operator on your behalf.
If the options above are not possible, you could give the phone number of your hotel or your original phone number (if it is reachable in Vietnam).
Moreover, kindly check your email frequently to update any changes (if there is) as soon as possible.
